name: Justin Enoch
bio: Justin Enoch is a Romanian-born, LA-based sound designer, composer, and interdisciplinary artist. Their work has screened at Sundance, TIFF, and the Student Academy Awards.

name: Troy Lewis
bio: Troy Lewis moved from Texas to Zambia at the age of 7, where he grew up in the capital, Lusaka. He is now a film editor based in Chicago. His work has screened at festivals such as Sundance, and Outfest, and PBS' AfroPop.

name: Grace Hahn
bio: Grace Hahn is a producer, accountant, and post-production manager. She was recognized by NewCity as one of Chicago's 2020 Film50 'Screen Gems.' Her dog is a tripawd.
